data.text: @KellyRenee14 Definitely....Gerard Butler could  absolutely...carry off any of the major musical roles...if he can sing the Phantom..(.and he was amazing).. he can sing anything!! Amazing performance!!❤️
@KellyRenee14 Definitely... there is a prequel... Love Never Dies...may be an opportunity for them???❤️
@KellyRenee14 I bet Emmy's up for it, but Gerard is still raking in that Geostorm money.... he needs more time.
